Plot: The love story who transformed Juana, Queen of Spain, into Juana "The mad". A story of passions, lies and jealousy with a politic fight behind.
Title: Mad Love
Writer: Vicente Aranda (screenplay), Antonio Larreta (screenplay), Manuel Tamayo y Baus (play)
Actors: Pilar López de Ayala, Daniele Liotti, Rosana Pastor, Giuliano Gemma
